etymologies: mid 19th century: from Spanish, probably based on Greek tuphos ‘steam or smoke’

definitions: a heated chamber in which Madeira wine is stored and matured.
shortDefinitions: heated chamber in which Madeira wine is stored and matured

definitions: an underground chamber in which a fire is kept permanently alight, traditionally used as a place of assembly by the Pueblo people.
shortDefinitions: underground chamber in which fire is kept permanently alight, used as place of assembly by Pueblo people
